name: ball-swipe-pwa
description: A ball swipe puzzle game PWA

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp *.html *.css *.js manifest.json sw.js dist/ && cp -r icons levels dist/
scripts.build:mobile: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap open android
scripts.ios: npm run build:mobile && npx cap open ios
